pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dynamic and Interactive Maps // Dynamic and Interactive Maps with R, powered by 'leaflet' https://leafletjs.com. 'evolMap' generates a web page with interactive and dynamic maps to which you can add geometric entities (points, lines or colored geographic areas), and/or markers with optional links between them. The dynamic ability of these maps allows their components to evolve over a continuous period of time or by periods.
